participant_1.background:
I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background.
last season i was just getting started.
my favorite food is mashed potatoes.
i am the youngest of five.
i write fiction for fun.

participant_2.background:
I had a small party with my friends.
i love to go horseback riding.
i work for a beer distributor.
I've been in the best shape of my life thanks to regular exercise.
i like to make bagels.

content.text: It's going well, thanks! I had a small party with my friends last night. How about you?
It's going good! I'm just getting started on a new story.
That's awesome! I love writing fiction. What's your story about?
It's about a group of friends who go horseback riding in the mountains.
That sounds fun! I love going horseback riding.
Me too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
It really is. I love the feeling of the wind in my hair and the sun on my face.
Me too! I also love the challenge of riding a horse.
It is challenging, but it's also really rewarding.
I agree. It's a great way to get exercise and have fun.
It is! I'm glad you're enjoying your story.
Thanks! I'm having a lot of fun writing it.
That's great to hear. I'm looking forward to reading it when you're finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's done
